Sentence.sentence: Scientists have devised a way to determine roughly where a person has lived using a strand of hair, a technique that could help track the movements of criminal suspects or unidentified murdervictims.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: He had his hair cut yesterday
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: "You're what you eat and drink, and that's recorded in your hair,"said Thure Cerling, a geologist at the University of Utah.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Basically we turned our skin darker to serve as a natural sun protector in the place of the hair we lost.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It helps build nails, hair, bones and muscles.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Last year, MATTEL, the company that makes Barbie dolls, added some Barbies to its line that have different skin tones and hair textures.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The method relies on measuring how chemical variations in drinking water show up in people's hair.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: There are now Barbies of one of 7 skin tones, 22 eye colors and 24 hair styles to choose from.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They checked the accuracy of the map by testing 200 hair samples collected from 65 barber shops.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: They found that the average person's mind wandered most frequently about 65% of the time during personal activities, such as brushing their teeth and combing their hair.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: They were able to accurately place the hair samples in broad regions roughly corresponding to the movement of rain systems.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: Today we have a few patches of hair remaining on various parts of our bodies.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: We think we lost this hair because of the need to keep ourselves cool when we were moving around vigorously in a hot environment.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: When Park heard about the research, he gave the hair samples to the researchers.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

word_mean: 毛，发：为皮肤表面的附属物，由角质构成，呈细长纤维状，一般为毛(pili 〔NA〕)，头颅部的粗而密者为发(capilli 〔NA〕)。毛由圆柱形的毛干和毛根构成，毛根被包在长颈瓶状的包囊内并深插至真皮及皮下组织。毛根的基部膨大形成毛球，毛球封包毛乳头并位于其上

a very small amount or margin
jx.jx_cn_mean: 极小量；间不容发的距离

(非正式)毫无顾忌；随随便便；不加控制；无拘无束

phrase.cizu_name: make someone's hair stand on end

entry.def: Your hair is the fine threads that grow in a mass on your head.

example.ex: I wash my hair every night...

entry.def: Hair is the short, fine threads that grow on different parts of your body.

example.ex: The majority of men have hair on their chest...
It tickled the hairs on the back of my neck.
example.tran: 它挠得我后脖梗儿的绒毛直痒痒。

entry.def: Hair is the threads that cover the body of an animal such as a dog, or make up a horse's mane and tail.

example.ex: I am allergic to cat hair.

entry.def: Hairs are short, very fine threads that grow on some insects and plants.

example.ex: The stinging nettle has a square stem and little hairs.
example.tran: 荨麻长有四方茎和细小茸毛。

entry.def: If you let your hair down, you relax completely and enjoy yourself.
entry.tran: 彻底放松;玩个痛快;无拘无束

example.ex: ...the world-famous Oktoberfest, a time when everyone in Munich really lets their hair down.
example.tran: 全球闻名的啤酒节，一个让所有身在慕尼黑的人都尽情放松的节日

entry.def: Something that makes your hair stand on end shocks or frightens you very much.

example.ex: This was the kind of smile that made your hair stand on end.
example.tran: 这是那种让人不寒而栗的微笑。

entry.def: If you say that someone has not a hair out of place, you are emphasizing that they are extremely smart and neatly dressed.

example.ex: She had a lot of make-up on and not a hair out of place.
example.tran: 她化了浓妆，精致得让人挑不出一丝瑕疵。

entry.def: If you say that someone faced with a shock or a problem does not turn a hair, you mean that they do not show any surprise or fear, and remain completely calm.
entry.tran: 面不改色;毫不惊慌;泰然自若

example.ex: No one seems to turn a hair at the thought of the divorced Princess marrying.
example.tran: 似乎没有人对离异的公主再婚感到丝毫地吃惊。

entry.def: If you say that someone is splitting hairs, you mean that they are making unnecessary distinctions between things when the differences between them are so small they are not important.

example.ex: Don't split hairs. You know what I'm getting at.
example.tran: 别钻牛角尖了。你知道我指什么。

means.word_mean: 1. dense growth of hairs covering the body or parts of it (as on the human head); helps prevent heat loss;
2. a very small distance or space;

sentences.sentence: "they lost the election by a whisker"

means.word_mean: 3. filamentous hairlike growth on a plant;
4. any of the cylindrical filaments characteristically growing from the epidermis of a mammal;

sentences.sentence: "there is a hair in my soup"

means.word_mean: 5. cloth woven from horsehair or camelhair; used for upholstery or stiffening in garments
6. a filamentous projection or process on an organism

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hǣr, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch haar and German Haar

sentences.cn: 科学家已经发现了一种通过人的一缕头发大致判断其居住地的方法。这项技术可以用来追踪犯罪嫌疑人的行踪或辨别谋杀案受害者的身份。

sentences.cn: 类似的模式在全美国都存在。通过测量一缕头发中氢和氧的较重同位素的比例，科学家可以构建出一个地理学上的时间序列。
sentences.en: Similar patterns exist throughout the U.S. By measuring the proportion of heavier hydrogen and oxygen isotopes along a strand of hair, scientists can construct a geographic timeline.

Sentence.sentence: A tall man with dark hair and a moustache.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And here's one more: We went on a campaign trip once in Italy, and my wife spent the whole time worrying about bats getting into her hair.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: For example, she would say, you'll get a spot on your tongue if you tell a lie; if you eat stale bread, your hair will curl.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B
